title: Vase, "Cobalt blue series", 1924–26
dimensions: H x diam.: 24 x 15 cm (9 7/16 x 5 7/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Thin, pale blue, mouth-blown crystal. Globular body rising to flaring neck with wide circular mouth; knob on stem; flat circular foot.

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, "Cobalt blue series", 1924–26.
1924–26. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-118.
